model.description: The model which will generate the completion. Models are loaded and managed through the Lemonade server.

temperature.description: Controls the randomness of the generated text. Lower values make the output more focused and deterministic, while higher values make it more diverse and random.

topP.description: Chooses from the smallest possible set of tokens whose cumulative probability exceeds the probability top_p. Helps generate more human-like text by reducing repetitions.

frequencyPenalty.description: Adjusts the penalty for tokens that have already appeared in the generated text. Positive values discourage repetition, negative values encourage it.

presencePenalty.description: Adjusts the penalty for tokens based on their presence in the generated text so far. Positive values penalize tokens that have already appeared, encouraging diversity.

maxTokens.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate. Set to -1 for no limit. Be cautious when setting this to a large value, as it can lead to very long outputs.

stop.description: Comma-separated list of sequences where the model will stop generating text
